title: Pentatonic Pathways - Intro to the Scale
description: The Pentatonic is the essential lead guitar player's tool for crafting great, memorable solos!

title: Spicing up the Blues - Sliding 9th Chords

title: Improving Your Phrasing - Intro
description: This tutorial is about improving your phrasing. This is a very difficult topic for the following reasons: Everyone has their own tastes, Everyone hears thing differently, Laziness
